name: StoryLinks
description:
NOTE: Game is INCOMPLETE, but you can still explore a bunch of ideas.

There are different stories to choose from and explore. Read through a branching story and discover and track story specific info (like Mystery Clues, or Political Powers, or Jailbreak Tools, or just a bunch of cats).

After revealing enough of the story the final conclusion unlocks where you can use the info you've collected to finish off the story.

Game Details

MOUSE-OVER any highlighted words to open their description box.

  • Blue words are UNREAD. 
  • Red words have been READ already.
  • Gray words mean that ALL words inside it have been read.

You can click the lock button in the top left corner of description boxes to keep that box-chain on the screen. Locking with freeze either all the center link-words, or all the side-panel link-words.

You can switch stories at any time from the Story Choosing Menu at the top of the screen which you can hover over to expand.

For best performance use Firefox.

The game may not be done, and is pretty janky, but I hope you have fun taking a look at my ideas!
